Message - Admin Override Disabled the Re: The remover tool was disabled for the time being.
Message - Cant Use Remove With Item: You can't use the remover tool while you have an active item
Message - External Plugin Blocking Remov: You are not allowed use the remover tool at the moment
Message - No Rights To Remove This: You have no rights to remove this
Message - Not Allowed: You are not allowed to use this command
Message - Not Enough To Pay: You don't have enough to pay for this remove
Message - Nothing To Remove: Couldn't find anything to remove. Are you close enough?
Message - Raid Blocked: RaidBlocker: You need to wait for {0}s before being allowed to remove again
Message - Target Remover Tool Ended: The Remover Tool for {0} has ended

Messages.cantRemove: You are not allowed to remove this
Messages.helpAdmin: /remove admin Optional:Time - To remove start removing anything
Messages.helpAll: /remove all Optional:Time - To remove start removing an entire building
Messages.helpRay: /rayremove - To remove the entire building that you are looking at
Messages.NoAccess: You don't have the permissions to use this command
Messages.noBuildingFound: Couldn't find any structure to remove
Messages.noFriend: You must be friend with the building owner
Messages.noToolCupboard: You need a Tool Cupboard to remove this
Messages.noToolCupboardAccess: You need access to all Tool Cupboards around you to do this
Messages.tooFar: You must get closer to remove this
